author: John Psaropoulos
title: After virus control, Greece hopes for economic recovery
description: The IMF predicts a drop of 10 percent for Greeceâ€™s GDP this year, followed by 5 percent growth next year.
content:
The coronavirus outbreak hit Greece while it was still recovering from a major refugee and financial crisis.
Yet it introduced lockdown measures to prevent the spread earlier than most European nations.
Its fatalities have been low and it is now hoping for … [+79 chars]
